Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. server command
2. client command
3. specific action to trigger the bug

 - Client OS: [e.g. Windows 10]
 - Server Version [e.g. 4.2.3]
 - Client Version [e.g. 4.3]

Add any other context about the problem here.
